    • Method Detail

      • search

        public java.util.Vector<java.util.Properties> search()
        Search for all service registered on the service registry.
        Returns:
        Return an array of Properties. Each property contains all the available parameters related to the service. The array could be include zero, one or more that one property object, it depends on the registry content

      • search

        public java.util.Vector<java.util.Properties> search(java.util.Properties serviceProperties)
        Search for all service registered on the service registry that match the parameters value passed.
        Parameters:
        serviceProperties - the service properties (e.g. p1=a, p2=b, kk=hello)
        Returns:
        Return an array of Properties. Each property contains all the available parameters related to the service. The array could be include zero, one or more that one property object, it depends on the registry content.

      • add

        public java.lang.String add(java.util.Properties serviceProperties)
        Add a service to the register
        Parameters:
        serviceProperties - the service properties (e.g. p1=a, p2=b, kk=hello) that describe the service
        Returns:
        Return the service response. It should be one of the following: ERROR:Service NO_SERVICE_01 is already registered!ERROR:Please check! ERROR:The "sid", service ID, is need ERROR:At least one parameter is need! Use "sid" the service ID. OK:Done! Return null in case of unplanned error

      • remove

        public java.lang.String remove(java.util.Properties serviceProperties)
        Remove a service from the register
        Parameters:
        serviceProperties - the service properties (e.g. p1=a, p2=b, kk=hello) that describe the service
        Returns:
        Return the service response. It should be one of the following: ERROR:The "sid", service ID, parameter is needed! ERROR:The service "NO_SERVICE_01" is not registered yet! OK:Done! Return null in case of unplanned error
